name: Solalien
description:
The solarpunk city has been hit by a meteorite, and it's being invaded by hostile alien lifeforms. You are the only one who is immune to the toxicity of aliens, and the only one who can stop them.

Use your eco-friendly dynamo-powered electro-pistol to eliminate aliens and save the solarpunk city from an extraterrestrial threat! Take the crossbow and tranquilize aliens for scientific purposes!

This game was made for Godot Wild Jam #38.
